title: Multicolour Gemstone & Diamond Necklace
description: Lariat necklace with pear shape Natural Gemstones (including blue Topaz, Citrine, Amethyst, Tanzanite, Peridot, Garnet & pink Tourmaline) totalling 7.50ct and round Natural Diamonds totalling 0.50ct (Estimated grading: H-I SI-P1). Flower motif size: 2cm & 1.5cm. 18ct white gold. Adjustable max length: 41.5 cm. Weight: 23.7g. (Pre-owned)
